searchType.description: An index representing the type of search to default to. The order of search types is as follows, 0=Exact Match, 1=Regular Expression, 2=Loose

ST0CaseSens.description: Represents the case sensitivity of the Exact Match search type

ST1CaseSens.description: Represents the case sensitivity of the Regular Expression search type

ST2PercentMatch.description: Represents the amount a selection has to match before selecting it for Loose Search.

maximumMatches.description: Represents the maximum amount of matches to search for
